name: Chin-Wan Chung
content: Chung, Chin-Wan Contact Information E-mail : Address :  Dept. of Computer Science and Div. of Web Science & Technology Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (KAIST) 291 Daehak-ro, Yusong-gu, Daejeon, 305-701, SouthKorea Phone :   +82-42-350-3537 Fax :      +82-42-350-3510 Education and Experiences B.S. in Electrical Engineering, Seoul National University M.S. in Electrical Engineering, Univ.of Michigan Ph.D. in Computer Engineering, Univ.of Michigan Thesis (Ph.D.) : A Query Optimization in Distributed Database Systems System Analyst, Computing Center,Warner-Lambert Parke-Davis, 1979 Senior Research Scientist, Computer Science Dept., GM Research Labs., 1983 - 1987 Staff Research Scientist, Computer Science Dept., GM Research Labs., 1987 - 1993 Associate Professor, Dept. of Information and Communication Engineering, KAIST, 1993 - 1996 Associate Professor, Dept. of Computer Science, KAIST, 1996 - 2000 Professor, Dept. of Computer Science, KAIST, 2000 - 2014 Professor Emeritus, School of Computing, KAIST, 2014 - Present Professor, Chongqing Liangjiang KAIST International Program, Chongqing University of Technology (CQUT), 2015 - 2020 Professional Activities International Conference/Workshop Program Committee Database Subcommittee of MAP(Manufacturing Automation Protocol) International Standard Committee, 1988 -1990 Advisory Board,Korea National Geographic Information Systems Program, 1994 - 2001 Advisor, Hyundai Information Technology,1995 - 1996 Chair, Department of Information and Communication Engineering, KAIST, 1995 - 1996 Vice President, Korean Society for Geo-spatial Information Systems, 1999 - 2003 Board of Directors, Korean Open GIS Society, 2000 - 2004 Tutorial Chair, The First Int.Conference on Human.Society@Internet, 2001 Chair, Department of Computer Science, KAIST, 2001-2003 Program Committee Chair, Korean Database Conference 2002, 2002 President, the Korean Institute of Information Scientists and Engineers (KIISE) SIG Databases, 2002 - 2004 Program Committee Co-Chair, The Second Int. Conference on Human.Society@Internet, 2003 Board of Directors, KIISE , 2004 Associate Editor, ACM Transactions on Internet Technology, 2004-2007 Editor-in-Chief, KIISE Journal of Databases, 2005-2006 Publicity Co-Chair, The 12th international conference on Database systems for Advanced Application, 2007 Co-Chair, International Workshop on Wireless Sensor Network Research, 2008 Editorial Review Board, Proceedings of VLDB, 2008-2010 Associate Editor, World Wide Web Journal, 2008-Present Co-Chair, The 2nd International Workshop on Wireless Sensor Networks and Embedded Systems Research, 2009 Director, Globalization Program of IT Convergence Campus, KAIST, 2009-2013 Co-Chair, The 1st International Workshop on Semantic Web, Mobile Web, and Social Networks, 2010 External Advisor, University of South Pacific, Fiji, 2011-2013 Member, International World Wide Web Conference Steering Committee (IW3C2), 2011 - present Tutorial Co-Chair, VLDB, 2012 Chair, Chongqing International College Establishment Committee, KAIST, 2012 - 2015 Member, Bigdata Innovators Gathering (BIG) Steering Committee, 2013 - 2014, 2017 - 2020 General Chair, The International WWW Conference, 2014 Director, South West Region of the Korean Scientists and Engineers Association in China, 2015 - 2017 Member, International World Wide Web Conference Test of Time Award Selection Committee, 2015 - Present Member, Editorial Board of CAAI Transactions on Intelligence Technology, 2016 - 2019 Auditor, Korean Scientists and Engineers Association in China, 2017 - 2019 Member, The ACM Web Conference Steering Committee, 2022 - Present Research Interests Large-Scale Information Systems Data/Knowledge Management and Analysis Web and Social Networks Publications International Journals International Conferences Domestic Journals Domestic Conferences Books Patents International Patents Domestic Patents Courses Discrete Mathematics Data Structures Introductionto Database Systems Database Systems Database Design
